name: Focused Gaze
description: Base Physical Ranged and Magic attacks of all attacking Units gain +3 <range></range> range.

name: Arcanium Tremors
description: Every 2 <turn></turn> Turns, all non-Floating and non-Flying attacking units suffer 20 <damagephysical></damagephysical> Physical Damage

name: Wave of Tranquility
description: Every 2 <turn></turn> Turns, all Status Effects on all units are dispelled

name: Disruption Pulse
description: Every 3 <turn></turn> Turns, all positive status effects are dispelled from all units. For each status effect dispelled, the unit gains <hyperlink>Sundered Resistance</hyperlink>

name: Nature Leeching
description: The defending Horned God is leeching power from the surrounding nature. Each <turn></turn> Turn, all Flora Obstacles within a 2-hex range are consumed, healing the Horned God +10 <hp></hp> and granting 1 Strengthened for 3 <turn></turn> Turns.

name: Mass Spawning
description: A wave of 2 additional defending units will spawn in X <turn></turn> Turns.

name: Avert Your Eyes!
description: All attacking units become Blind but gain <hyperlink>Immune to Seduced</hyperlink> until the end of battle.

name: Magma Split
description: When a defending Magma Spirit is killed, it spawns 1 Lesser Magma Spirit

name: Draconic Catalyst
description:
When a Red Dragon has Draconic Rage, all attacking units have a 90% chance to suffer Burning every turn.

When a Blue Dragon has Draconic Rage, all attacking units have a 90% chance to suffer Frozen every turn.

name: Gorgon's Curse
description: At the start of battle, a unit is secretly chosen to be the target of the curse. This target will become <hyperlink>Stunned</hyperlink> in 2 <turn></turn> Turns if it is still alive, and a new target will then be chosen.

name: Haunted Coffins
description: Whenever a Sarcophacus obstacle is destroyed, it summons a Skeleton on the defender's side until the end of combat.

name: Undead Servants
description:
Undead Servants fight to protect the Undead Queen!

All defending units resurrect 1 Turn after being killed for the first time.

Destroying the defending Hero instantly kills all enemies.

name: Sprawling Spiderwebs
description: At the start of combat, several Slowing Spider Web obstacles are present.

name: Crashing Rubble
description: Every 2 <turn></turn> Turns, a marker is placed. Then, after 1 <turn></turn> Turn burning debris will crash down, and units within 1 <range></range> of the marker will suffer 10 <damagephysical><damagephysical> Physical and 10 <damagefire></damagefire> Fire Damage. The target hexes will gain <hyperlink>On Fire</hyperlink>.

name: Rampant Fire
description: Several areas and flammable obstacles are <hyperlink>On Fire</hyperlink>.

name: Oh So Lucky
description: Every 2 <turn></turn> Turns, all defending units gain <hyperlink>Rally</hyperlink> and <hyperlink>Fortune</hyperlink>.

name: Unnatural Speed
description: Defending Units have <hyperlink>Hastened</hyperlink>, <hyperlink>Swift</hyperlink>, and <hyperlink>Slippery</hyperlink> until end of combat.

name: Distracting Whispers
description: Each 2 <turn></turn> Turns, one of the defending units has a 90% base chance of suffering <hyperlink>Distracted</hyperlink> until end of combat.

name: Archon Martyrdom
description: When a defending unit dies, all adjacent hostile units suffer 15 <damagespirit></damagespirit> Spirit Damage and have a 90% base chance of becoming <hyperlink>Comdemned</hyperlink>.

name: Displaced Reality
description: Every 2 <turn></turn> Turns, all attacking units are displaced by 2 hexes.
